experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: At apna, I have worked on reshaping the product and contributed to the development lifecycle. I added various filtering and sorting techniques to the Job Search system and written automated Test cases for the same. Moving to next I have also improved the platform by configuring fallbacks for better User satisfaction. I have contributed to re architecturing various existing backend APIs for the smooth and robust working of the application. I have made some important migrations in the Database. My most recent contribution was configuring the Recommendation System that works during the onboarding of new users to Apna‚Äôs platform. Along with these, I have worked on building a retooling Dashboard.
